backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, coin creation, balances, orders, and in‑memory Stripe session tracking with authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and asset‑flow updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring light/dark trading‑style color tokens and global typography/background styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, Stripe.js, favicon, and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining public and authenticated layouts with pages for dashboard, coins, activity, deposit, and withdraw.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for creating a user profile with username, display name, bio, validation, and error handling.
Main application shell with header, navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/CyberBack: Renders a fixed trading-themed background image with gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/payments/StripeC: Stripe card input component that mounts a Stripe card element and handles cardholder name and card errors.
frontend/src/components/rank/RankBadge.t: Displays rank information in compact, full, or card formats using tier styling and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBalances.t: Fetches a user's token balance for a given symbol using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoinsDirec: Builds a symbol-to-coin directory from backend data and profiles; also provides lookup by symbol.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCreatorCap: Queries creator market cap rankings and fetches the caller's specific creator cap value.
Provides mutations for creating deposits and withdrawals via Stripe-backed backend sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useLeaderboar: Fetches creator cap rankings and maps them into a ranked leaderboard structure.
Retrieves order book data for a given symbol and side with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Mutation hook to place an order via actor and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStablecoin: Query hook fetching the user's USDC balance from the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, including current, specific, and placeholder list queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and utility classes with terminal-style aesthetics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Leaderboard page displaying creator rankings with profile lookups and styled ranking rows.
frontend/src/pages/CoinDetailPage.tsx: Asset detail page fetching coin data, order books, and enabling buy/sell order placement.
frontend/src/pages/CoinsPage.tsx: Displays a searchable grid of coin profiles fetched from the coins directory and navigates to individual coin pages. Handles loading, error states, and search filtering.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the user’s dashboard with profile info, balances, rank status, and progress toward the next rank. Includes loading states and multiple metric cards.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Provides a form for depositing USD via Stripe to receive USDC, showing current balance, fees, and success feedback. Handles Stripe card input and deposit submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with login flow, hero section, and feature highlights, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard. Includes animated visuals and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Allows users to withdraw USDC to a bank account with fee calculation, balance display, and success messaging. Validates input and submits withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/utils/assetSymbols.ts: Returns a user's asset symbol directly from their username with no transformation.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting USDC amounts, prices, and large market cap values into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/rank.ts: Defines rank tiers based on creator market cap and provides helpers to get the current tier, next tier, and progress percentage.
frontend/src/utils/stripe.ts: Initializes and returns a Stripe instance from the global window object and defines a simple card element event type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s build state, goals, requirements, issues, and design direction for the StonkSquad app.
